getClasses(dico, module=None)[source]ÔÉÅ
numericalOrder(nSteps, err)[source]ÔÉÅ

Utility function to compute numerical order from error and nSteps vectors

Parameters:

  • nSteps (np.1darray or list) ‚Äì Different number of steps to compute the error.

  • err (np.1darray) ‚Äì Diffenrent error values associated to the number of steps.

Returns:

  • beta (float) ‚Äì Order coefficient computed through linear regression.

  • rmse (float) ‚Äì The root mean square error of the linear regression.
